meta.title: ArtByZuzu
meta.description: Art and Design By Marianne Zuzunaga From Barcelona to the world
meta.author: Marianne Zuzunaga

pages.title: Design is the advantage
pages.text: Design is becoming a competitive advantage for every new single project.As we move out of the age of information and into the conceptual age, we are faced with the demand to create product experiences that are no less than exceptional.

posts.title: Design is the advantage
posts.text: Design is becoming a competitive advantage for every new single project.As we move out of the age of information and into the conceptual age, we are faced with the demand to create product experiences that are no less than exceptional.
